content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols **japanese version available here 1 ** you may need to adjust the number of stitches and/or row to fit dust mops in your country pattern sized for japanese dust mops **materials ** * 2 wooden buttons 18mm * 45g 29 25m color a * 45g 29 25m color b **note ** the x symbol with a u around it is a single_crochet loop stitch see photo tutorial here 2 previously released as amikomo3-29 3 patterns are identical 1 http //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/amicomo8-10/ 2 http //i-s milkcafe to/ami/kiso/komaami-r html 3 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/amikomo3-29/
